sentence.Network_en: The destruction of the mosque has provoked anger throughout the Muslim world.

sentence.Network_en: Hundreds of thousands of people packed into the mosque.
sentence.Network_cn: 几十万人挤进了那座清真寺。

sentence.Network_en: A glittering Islamic crescent tops the mosque.
sentence.Network_cn: 新月形标志在清真寺顶端闪闪发光。
